messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 08/17/1999 6:49:54 PM Eastern Daylight Time, mrstar@gateway.net writes:
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 08/17/1999 6:49:54 PM Eastern Daylight Time,
mrstar@... writes:

<< <go to www.cnn.com and VOTE YES
there is a vote for yes, homeschooling is better education and safer
or no, it's not better, right now the NO are winning
go to the bottom of their page under quick vote
>>

I just went there and voted....it's now Yes - 39% (9063 votes) and No - 58%
(12,727 votes)....this is as of 8:20 pm EST.

Sam

messages.subject: Check this out, interesting.
messages.msgSnippet: Attention homeschooling and unschooling friends I just got this, went there, and am sharing. It isn t spam if it is verifiable so I better not get flamed. It
messages.messageBody:
Attention homeschooling and unschooling friends
I just got this, went there, and am sharing. It isn't spam if it is verifiable so I better not get flamed. It is relevant and it is real. I was just there. Mary/in Idaho/starfreedom (whatever)

<go to www.cnn.com and VOTE YES
there is a vote for yes, homeschooling is better education and safer
or no, it's not better, right now the NO are winning
go to the bottom of their page under quick vote

Here are the results when I was there at 4:30 pm mountain time. Mary


Created: Tue Aug 17 11:50:41 EDT 1999

Do you support home schooling for children?
Yes; it's a
better
education and
it's safer
39%
6799 votes
No; it's not a
better
education and
it's isolating

10691 votes
Total: 17490 votes

p.s., sorry for any repeats guys.
